author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49322 

#### PR description:

After the merging of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49304 we can actually move forward using the real HLT menu in the 2025 PbPb workflows, while the 2024 relval workflows need to demoted to use `@fake2`.
#### PR validation:

```
runTheMatrix.py -l 162,182,143.201 -i all --ibeos
```

runs:

```
162.0_HydjetQ_B12_5362GeV_2025 Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED Step4-PASSED  - time date Wed Nov  5 15:27:03 2025-date Wed Nov  5 15:19:48 2025; exit: 0 0 0 0 0
182.0_Pythia8_GammaNucleus_5360_UPC_2025 Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED Step4-PASSED  - time date Wed Nov  5 15:27:17 2025-date Wed Nov  5 15:19:49 2025; exit: 0 0 0 0 0
2 2 2 2 2 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 failed
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Plain backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49322 to the 2025 PbPb production release.
title: [15.1.X] updated HLT menu in 2024 and 2025 PbPb relval workflows
